p: Other malaria parasites also affect animals, including reptiles, birds 27, 28 (with infections recently reported as far north as Alaska 56), and some mammals. Occasionally, humans are infected by Plasmodium species that normally infect animals (e.g., Plasmodium knowlesi, usually transmitted in small primates). 57 Fully susceptible penguins have been severely impacted by avian malaria in UK zoos in 2016. This might be related to both conducive environmental conditions for both the vector and parasite, and the importation of parasites in migratory birds.
